original_text: And when his brethren saw that their father loved him more than all his brethren, they hated him, and could not speak peaceably unto him.
korean_text: 그의 형들이 아버지가 형들보다 그를 더 사랑함을 보고 그를 미워하여 그에게 편안하게 말할 수 없었더라

sentences.original_text: that their father loved him more than all his brethren
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아버지가 그를 모든 형제들보다 더 사랑한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and could not speak peaceably unto him
